description: Loads URL patterns, internationalization resources, templates and BBCode handlers for the application.
businessLogic:
1. Input Collection:
   - Collect applicationPath (mandatory): The root path of the application
   - Collect configDirectory (mandatory): Directory containing configuration files
   - Collect templateMappingPath (mandatory): Path to template mapping configuration
   - System will determine if running in debug mode (system-generated)

2. Data Validation:
   - Validate applicationPath:
     a. Check if path exists
     b. Verify read permissions on the path
     c. IF path does not exist or is not readable THEN
        i. Generate error message "Invalid application path"
        ii. Abort loading process
   - Validate configDirectory:
     a. Check if directory exists within application path
     b. Verify read permissions on the directory
     c. IF directory does not exist or is not readable THEN
        i. Generate error message "Configuration directory not found or not accessible"
        ii. Abort loading process
   - Validate templateMappingPath:
     a. Check if file exists
     b. Verify read permissions on the file
     c. IF file does not exist or is not readable THEN
        i. Generate error message "Template mapping file not found or not accessible"
        ii. Abort loading process

3. Business Rule Processing:
   - Check system state:
     a. Verify if configuration components are not already loaded
     b. IF components are already loaded THEN
        i. Determine if reload is necessary based on timestamps
        ii. IF reload not necessary THEN skip loading
   - Check dependencies:
     a. Verify that system globals are initialized
     b. Verify that cache engine is running
     c. IF any dependency check fails THEN
        i. Generate appropriate error message
        ii. Abort loading process

4. Core Operation Execution:
   - Load URL patterns:
     a. Read URL pattern configuration files from config directory
     b. Parse pattern definitions
     c. Register patterns in the system repository
     d. IF any pattern fails to load THEN
        i. Log warning message
        ii. Continue with next pattern
   - Load internationalization resources:
     a. Determine current locale setting
     b. Load language resource files for the locale
     c. Parse language key-value pairs
     d. Register translations in the system repository
     e. IF any resource fails to load THEN
        i. Log warning message
        ii. Continue with next resource
   - Load templates:
     a. Read template mapping file
     b. Parse template definitions
     c. Register templates in the system repository
     d. IF any template fails to load THEN
        i. Log warning message
        ii. Continue with next template
   - Load BBCode handlers:
     a. Initialize BBCode parser
     b. Parse BBCode definitions
     c. Register BBCode collection in the system repository
     d. IF any BBCode definition fails to parse THEN
        i. Log warning message
        ii. Continue with next definition

5. Response Generation:
   - Generate success response:
     a. Create summary of loaded components
     b. Include counts of loaded URL patterns, language resources, templates, and BBCode handlers
     c. Include timestamp of completion
   - IF any component failed to load completely THEN
     a. Include warning message in response
     b. List specific components that failed to load
   - IF critical failure occurred THEN
     a. Generate error response with detailed message
     b. Include troubleshooting information
validationRules: Application path must exist and be readable
Configuration directory must exist and be readable
Template mapping file must exist and be readable
URL patterns must follow the defined format
Language resource files must exist for the configured locale
Template definitions must reference existing template files
BBCode definitions must follow the correct syntax
